 2019-05842019-05-21TC,  CTA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectAir Passenger Protection Regulations
PrecisAIR PASSENGER PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) create new air passenger protection regulations that are world-leading and feature robust, simple, clear, and consistent passenger rights; (2) reflect operational realities of carriers and allow for carrier innovation, where appropriate; and (3) align with international agreements, and apply best practices lessons learned from other jurisdictions, where appropriate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0150 Publication Date: 2019-05-29
